jcr:content.jcr:description: At Altra Running, we take our values seriously. Weâ€™re determined to help you unleash your human potential and move naturally while finding joy in the outdoors.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Our Values

image.alt: Man in a pink shirt and blu shorts running on a trail

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
MOVE NATURALLY

Pursue a healthy lifestyle by moving the way we were born to move.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
HUMAN POTENTIAL
Seek out opportunities to unlock the potential in ourselves and others.

image.alt: Man in a red shirt running in the mountains

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
DISCOVERY

Move to discover more of ourselves and the world around us.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
JOY
Find joy in the challenge and the experience.

image.alt: A group of Altra employees doing a trash cleanup on a local trail

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
RESPONSIBILITY

Hold ourselves to a high standard in product, people, and performance.
